archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: SAR1 Power BI Dashboard
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Dashboard for aggregated statistics from SAR1. It shows the number of reviews over time, as well as average scores in total and for each of the SAR1 questions.
NOTE: The dates in the dashboard may be off with one day. This is due to a bug in SharePoint. The choice was made to not spend time fixing it.
